definition: Mongol ethnic group/abbr. for Mongolia 蒙古國|蒙古国[Meng3 gu3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Meng2]
to cover/ignorant/to suffer (misfortune)/to receive (a favor)/to cheat
(phonetic na)/used esp. in female names such as Anna 安娜[An1 na4] or Diana 黛安娜[Dai4 an1 na4]
see 莎草[suo1 cao3]/see 摩莎[mo2 suo1]

sentences.english: Mana Lisa probably is the world's most famous portrait.
sentences.chinese: 他的《蒙娜麗莎》是世界上最有名的人物肖像畫。

sentences.english: I smile through tears, is the Mona Lisa smile gave me endless strength.
sentences.chinese: 我竟破涕爲笑，是蒙娜麗莎的微笑給了我無窮的力量。

sentences.english: Monalisa's smile is one of her charms.
sentences.chinese: 蒙娜麗莎的微笑是她的迷人處之一。

sentences.english: It is this technique that makes the Mona Lisa's expression ambiguous.
sentences.chinese: 這就是使蒙娜麗莎的表情如此神祕莫測的手段了。

sentences.english: Can you imagine such a perfect art of Mona Lisa is made from pyrograph?
sentences.chinese: 你能想象這樣完美的蒙娜麗莎出自烙畫藝術麼？

sentences.english: A laser scanner takes measurements of the Mona Lisa in this undated handout photo.
sentences.chinese: 激光掃描儀被用於這張位表明日期的蒙娜麗莎照片。

sentences.english: The Loof museum said that she threw an empty mug at the Mona Lisa portrait last week.
sentences.chinese: 盧浮宮稱她上週將一個空杯子扔向蒙娜麗莎畫像。

sentences.english: The Mona Lisa is DaVinci's finest work.
sentences.chinese: 蒙娜麗莎是達芬奇非常棒的作品。

sentences.english: So what does the Mona Lisa say if you ask her why she is smiling?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，如果你問蒙娜麗莎在笑什麼，她會怎麼回答呢？

sentences.english: He often romanced over the oil painting of Mona Lisa.
sentences.chinese: 他常常對着油畫《蒙娜麗莎》想入非非。

sentences.english: Monalisa's smile is one of her charms.
sentences.chinese: 蒙娜麗莎的微笑是她的迷人處。

sentences.english: People obsessed with Mona Lisa smile, the Mona Lisa eyes hidden mystery.
sentences.chinese: 蒙娜麗莎微笑讓人迷戀，蒙娜麗莎雙眼暗藏玄機。

sentences.english: People obsessed with Mona Lisa smile, the Mona Lisa eyes hidden mystery.
sentences.chinese: 蒙娜麗莎微笑讓人迷戀，蒙娜麗莎雙眼暗藏玄機。

sentences.english: Mona lisa is smiling, but more than a smile.
sentences.chinese: 蒙娜麗莎在微笑，但似笑非笑。

sentences.english: The mysterious face with a pair of ocean-deep eyes is emerging like the phantom of Mona Lisa.
sentences.chinese: 神祕臉龐及深邃眼瞳隨著面紗如蒙娜麗莎的幻影再現。

sentences.english: Eland has recreated famous artwork such as the Mona Lisa using just coffee.
sentences.chinese: 伊蘭用咖啡臨摹繪製了《蒙娜麗莎》這樣的名畫。

definition: Jean Auguste Dominique Ingres (1780-1867), French Neoclassical painter
the implied message is deep (idiom); having deep implications
rigorous schemes and deep foresight (idiom); astute and circumspect
